amendment.description: Amendment redirects $2 million from Program Administration under Departmental Management at the Department of Education to Emerging Zoonotic and Infectious Diseases at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for Lyme Disease.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to redirect $2 million from Program Administration under Departmental Management at the Department of Education to Emerging Zoonotic and Infectious Diseases at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for Lyme Disease.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 11 (Roll no. 257).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 11 (Roll no. 257).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Smith (NJ).
